CustomField.description: This field is optional and can be collected as part of a workflow. A durable agency grants a continuing power of attorney after legal incapacitation of an individual which terminiates only upon the individual's death.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The authority granted to the deputy/agent on the safe deposit box lease is a durable power continuing after legal incapacity and terminating only at death of the appointing renter.
CustomField.label: Durable Agency
